verbs.description: CAPE CANAVERAL , Fla. ( AP ) — [V: Vowing] [ARG1: to reclaim U.S. leadership in space] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] announced Monday he is directing the Pentagon to create a new " Space Force " as an independent service branch aimed at ensuring American supremacy in space . Trump envisioned a bright future for the U.
